thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 79 of 7354
thread.title: jeff

author: jeff
title: jeff
text: B&H has a good reputation as being a vendor that provides a plethora of quality photography equipment and supplies at reasonable prices. Their return policy is fair in case an item isn't quite right or what was expected. The prices are slightly high on somethings, but well within what you would pay elsewhere. I honestly still do try to support my local camera store, but if they don't have what I'm looking for, or their prices are unreasonable, I'll try here next.
